description: While TaxCut was used in the 2000s to file taxes, H&R Block replaced the software in the 2009 tax year with H&R Block At Home, then rebranded it again as Tax Software. When a user works on a tax return in TaxCut 2004 and saves their progress, the software creates the T04 file to store the information. After saving a tax return, users can close the T04 file, then reopen it to work on it further.
